Great quick subs, better than subway by far

Choice between subway and potbelly? Of course potbelly, better ingredients more imaginative options, still as quick and convenient as subway but with better atmosphere so if you want to stay and eat at their place you feel like you are actually eating at a restaurant rather than eat and go franchise which is nice. Little bit pricier, though worth it.
As far as chain sandwich shops go, this is my new favorite. Try the skinny for a lite, inexpensive, but filling meal.

They have good coffee and delicious almond croissants that are fresh,fresh,fresh. I never had time to try the other food but if they can serve a good croissant the rest of their menu must be good. Prices were reasonable and the staff always had a smile.
Better deli than the Italian Store

So this is a nice Italian deli that offers up a choice of hard or soft rolls and all kinds of Italian subs and a bunch of cheesesteaks and burgers, one popular one being called the Bacon Bomb. I prefer the Italian subs here over the Italian Store and they have far more hot food options, including chicken parm, and...

The best French Fries in DC

Do NOT try to save calories by settling for packaged baked chips - get the fries and plan to split the order with a friend. Sandwiches are share-able too and it all adds up to a reasonable meal in the middle of the City. If you are in the neighborhood, well worth a stop for lunch.
